vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_2: Looks like %1$s was allergic to sunshine
vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_3: For %1$s, death came with the dawn
vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_4: %1$s had a toxic relationship with the sun
vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_5: %1$s has discovered that the sun is a deadly laser
vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_8: The sun always wins, as %1$s found out
vampire_blood.death.attack.sunlight_9: %1$s had their blood replaced with molten cheese
vampire_blood.death.self.bloodloss_1: %1$s donated their final drop to the Blood God
vampire_blood.death.self.bloodloss_3: %1$s tried to escape this cruel world
vampire_blood.death.self.bloodloss_4: Note to %1$s: stop playing with sharp objects
vampire_blood.death.attack.bloodloss_2: %1$s couldn't keep their blood safe from %2$s
vampire_blood.death.attack.bloodloss_4: %1$s discovered the downside of being tasty
vampire_blood.death.attack.bloodloss_6: %1$s became a human juice box for %2$s
text.vampire_blood.knife_usage_entity_la: Bloodletting target does not have the blood...
text.vampire_blood.feeding_stop_fail: You are having trouble controlling yourself...
text.vampire_blood.speed_in_armour: You feel burdened by the weight of your armor
text.vampire_blood.advancements.root.des: Legends tell of a way to attain eternal life...
text.vampire_blood.advancements.vampire_: Obtain a bottle of vampiric blood
What brings eternal life? Maybe death...
text.vampire_blood.advancements.bloodlet: Draw your own blood with a bloodletting knife
text.vampire_blood.advancements.transiti: You couldn't live with your own failure, and where did that bring you? Back to us.
text.vampire_blood.advancements.in_trans: Life after death? Why is everything so loud...
Drink human blood and become a vampire
text.vampire_blood.advancements.no_fledg: Survive long enough to age as a vampire, no longer a fledgling
text.vampire_blood.advancements.mature.d: Live long enough to reach maturity as a vampire
text.vampire_blood.advancements.all_bloo: Reach 100% dietary purity with every blood type
text.vampire_blood.advancements.charm.de: Use the power of your blood to charm an entity
text.vampire_blood.advancements.ability_: Creatures of the night see better in the dark
Discover your supernatural ability to be faster than any human
Focus your senses to detect nearby entities with extreme precision
Sense nearby creatures with drinkable blood
